edu.usm.cos420.assignment1.dao

Interface GenericDao<IDType,T extends java.io.Serializable>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the entity type
    IDType - the primary key type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JsonDao, ObjectStreamDao

    public interface GenericDao<IDType,T extends java.io.Serializable>
    Generic Data Access Interface that defines characteristics of basic CRUD operations

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      void add(IDType id, T entity)
      Add an entity to the persisted collection

    • Method Detail

      • add

        void add(IDType id,
         T entity)
        Add an entity to the persisted collection
        Parameters:
        id - id of the entity to be added with Type IDType
        entity - object of Type T to be added to the collection

      • update

        void update(IDType id,
            T entity)
        Update an entity in the persisted collection
        Parameters:
        id - id of the entity to located in the collection
        entity - new object of Type T to replace existing item

      • remove

        void remove(IDType id)
        Remove an entity in the persisted collection
        Parameters:
        id - id of the entity to be removed with Type IDType

      • find

        T find(IDType key)
        Find an entity to the persisted collection
        Parameters:
        key - id of the entity to be located in the persisted collection with Type IDType
        Returns:
        entity object of Type T that has the id field equal to key

      • list

        java.util.List<T> list()
        List all entities in the persisted collection
        Returns:
        List of all entity objects of Type T in the collection
